title: Order matters

comments:
Move the code lines up and down to change the order of go and turnRight,
Then press play to run your entire Java code

English uses ! for commands : Fetch the Ball!
but notice Java statements end with a semicolon ; instead

help: Perhaps if you go a bit too far you can end at the target square?
dyk: When the Java compiler reads our program it looks for semicolons
So we could write our entire program on just one line but that would be very difficult for people to read!
